item.title: The Street light outside the university of Westminster has two light off at the junction of Marylebone road and Luxborough Street. It has made the area very dark., 20th December
item.description:
The Street light outside the university of Westminster has two light off at the junction of Marylebone road and Luxborough Street. It has made the area very dark.

item.category: All out - three or more street lights in a row

item.title: Recyclable rubbish at the lower part of Point hill, 20th December
item.description:
There was a blue lid bin earlier. As there is no one anymore somebody just keeps putting paper rubbish in a pile on the ground.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Point Hill, Greenwich

item.title: Well Street council building lights not on, 20th December
item.description:
The external lights on the Well Streey council building do not turn on at the right time. All the other buildings lights are on except this one. The stairs are pitch black. This has been ongoing for years. Please turn them on earlier.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Well Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish all over, 20th December
item.description:
Marsham has had the same rubbish strewn for weeks. There is supposed to be a cleaning rota but clearly not the case. Marsham is an absolute disgrace and an eye sore. We pay council tax for roads to be cleared of litter. It shouldn't take someone to have to call it in.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Marsham Close, Chislehurst, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
